website_summaries.verdict: Good accuracy at a mid-range price. It also offers really good battery life, meaning it should be ready to go when you need it.
pros: Provides a reading within several seconds
Owners say battery life is very good
cons: Owners say readings aren’t accurate immediately after taking a drink
Needs to be recalibrated after a while

customer_reviews.title: I have an IID system in my car due to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have an IID system in my car due to a DUI I got. To make sure I never blew over the .03 limit set by that system (and get charged $50 every time I did) I decided to buy this product with all the positive reviews. However, when I blew in each to see if they would give me the same read out, this device was .015 lower than the one in my car. That's a big shift in difference. This could say you are right at .08 but if you were to get pulled over you would actually be closer to a .1. I'm returning mine and hopefully find a more accurate device
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Dillon

customer_reviews.title: I love that I can test myself
customer_reviews.text: I work as a RN, so ensuring that I'm not even close to the legal limit if I'm going to drive is VERY important to me, not only for public safety, but because, as a nurse, I could lose my nursing license if I'm at 0.08. I've compared this device to many others, and it is the most reliable I've come across. I love that I can test myself, and friends, and have confidence in the results it's showing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Wickes

customer_reviews.title: Wildly Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: It variously reported BAC of 0.26 sometimes 0.50 at which point I'd be dead. It's not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Craig

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work. DO NO BUY
customer_reviews.text: Nothing about this product works. Won't stay on. Flashes on and off. First time I tried it, I'd had one single beer and it showed. .4 BAC. After that it only displays 0.0 BAC. Absolutely does not work. Worst of all, I try to return it and get "item cannot be returned." What a complete rip off. Offering this product in the state I bought it is fraudulent. It does not work. Wish I could give zero stars rather than one.
customer_reviews.author: John Mockridge

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased two
customer_reviews.text: I use this all the time. While the accuracy is not going to be 100% reliable, neither is a breathalyzer from a police officer. The fact that your results might spike from mouth alcohol is a good thing. It reminds you that you're going to be in trouble if you do not allow enough time for that alcohol to eliminate. Mouth alcohol usually evaporates in 20 minutes. If you are still too high, get a cab. This is cheap insurance to make you think twice before drinking and driving. It is also a lot of fun at parties if you buy extra mouth pieces.
customer_reviews.author: pete_009

customer_reviews.title: Safety First
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job pretty well. Multiple takes read the same or very similar results. I would always blow twice to make sure anyway. As with an breathalyzer the longer you wait the more accurate the read, so taking within a few minutes of a drink will give you a false high read.
customer_reviews.author: VT Native

customer_reviews.title: Easy and as accurate as you can get for $99
customer_reviews.text: I have used this device for 2 weeks comparing it to another less expensive breathalyzer I have. This one picks up what I would consider a much more accurate reading. The cheaper one will read .000 after a few hours of having a couple beers. This device will still read .010 than gradually go down .005 etc until it finally reaches .000 another hour later. I would recommend this to anybody needing a self testing machine.
customer_reviews.author: best*seller

customer_reviews.title: It's a hit at every party
customer_reviews.text: I think the breathalyzer is fairly accurate. But note: You need a clean mouth piece in order to get an accurate reading. You can't keep blowing into the same mouth piece because eventually the readings become ridiculous. After each use just run the mouth piece under water for a second and that usually does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Nobody looks good in hand cuffs
customer_reviews.text: When you have 2 DUIs. You know you dont want a third one. Play it safe guys. You need this and I know this one is accurate. I tested it out with beer and liquor and timing and etc. Because nobody looks good in hand cuffs. Ehh.. unless you're into sorta thing.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work as advertised and does seem fairly consistent ...
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work as advertised and does seem fairly consistent, but only a friendly cop could prove its accuracy, as yet undetermined.
customer_reviews.author: Pedlar

customer_reviews.title: Blow and go
customer_reviews.text: I've put it to the test at home. It still detects small amounts after the fact. I like that I can see the previous results.
customer_reviews.author: JBRN

customer_reviews.title: and the best tool I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek, very accurate, and the best tool I have ever bought. I'm shocked at how buzzed a legal limit of 0.08 feels! The reading comes out in less than 20 seconds from start to finish. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: my daughters are bummed.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if I would trust this to the wire for DUI prevention, but as a parent it works great to know for sure if you're kid is lying to you about drinking. We make it part of the ritual when they come home and provides a great deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: George T.

customer_reviews.title: Rarely shows accurate result
customer_reviews.text: It is inaccurate and not reliable, never matches the result when tested a couple of times on one person, e.i one person tesed and got 0.04 then a couple of minutes ago without drinking got 0.12 then he got 0.08, meaning you cannot relay on this product, almost got me into losing my license when I tested and got 0.024 (you can drive if you are under 0.03) and when a police tested me I had 0.036.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perhaps this is a joke product?
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this, I charged it and tried it out (sober). The display seems to show two sets of numbers, one atop the other but just a bit shifted, so it's unreadable. Maybe this is a joke about drunk people being crosseyed? Dunno.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Minasi

customer_reviews.title: WORKS GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Don't try to reuse the mouthpiece all the time don't know why but it makes the reading variable .I just got 10 more works great .don't be cheap get extras !
customer_reviews.author: scott b.

customer_reviews.title: Built to last, fast results
customer_reviews.text: Works great, we use it daily at my substance abuse treatment facility. It's built for personal use but works fine for commercial use. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, and does exactly what it should.
customer_reviews.text: I use at a sober living, and it works exactly as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Worthington

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 3 weeks. At first it seemed to be pretty accurate, but after maybe 10 tests it is reading wildly high, almost 3 to 1 over actual. My bac was. 022 and it read. 097. I hope the police breathalyzer is more accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew I.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but best not to leave it in the cold car
customer_reviews.text: Although this breathalyzer is expensive it does work very well, I do feel I can trust the readings it gives, only complaints are that if you leave it in the cold car it doesn’t respond very well and can sometimes give battery issues, overall I have been Satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BACtrack trace breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work correctly but I don't have anything to compare the analysis with to know if it is correct or not.
customer_reviews.author: Toyota4Life

customer_reviews.title: The accuracy goes down with really use in one setting ...
customer_reviews.text: The accuracy goes down with really use in one setting (checked the same person 3 times in a row 2 minutes apart and the BAC dropped significantly each time).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Comer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a DUI
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak for the accuracy because I have nothing to confirm if this would match the cop if I were to get pulled over, but it's definitely interesting and fun. I also found out my tolerance is ridiculous, I am not a cheap drunk.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ondich

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine. Wish it displayed a date and time of ...
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine. Wish it displayed a date and time of the past uses, but at least I can see the numbers of the last few.
customer_reviews.author: Cmong

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and so far pretty accurate. Not sure what the negative reviews are about. Mine works fine. The plastic and buttons are a little flimsy but for $100 it works and is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: etteyafed

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This tester is junk. Never worked properly. Always gave a super high reading even when it should have said 0. I would give it a 0 star if they had this option.
customer_reviews.author: momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't turn on or work.  I got a defective breathalyzer
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and it does work. Doesn't even turn on. How can I send it back and get a refund?
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sanford

customer_reviews.title: Cool product
customer_reviews.text: I mostly got this to play around with since I rarely drink outside of my house. It works good and I have no reason to believe it's not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: I hada michelada at my favorite Mexican joint and a half a bottle of Bailey’s ...
customer_reviews.text: I hada michelada at my favorite Mexican joint and a half a bottle of Bailey’s and drove home. Thanks officer. P.s. the weed probably has helping
customer_reviews.author: Lukas

customer_reviews.title: the batteries they supply are garbage so try new duracell AAA
customer_reviews.text: The reviews about the battery cover , you need to hold the cover down and then push the clip on. Also for those that say it doesn't turn on, the batteries they supply are garbage so try new duracell AAA batteries
customer_reviews.author: McEwens

customer_reviews.title: Great breathalyzer, mouthpieces were wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Product worked just fine, however the mouth pieces provided did not fit at all... Had to buy seperate mouth pieces.
customer_reviews.author: James Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: Tried several before finding this one. All others often gave unreliable results. Got readings when I knew I had no alcohol in my system. This one is easy to use and the person I am testing can’t claim it’s a false result.
customer_reviews.author: Tnb

customer_reviews.title: Every one should have one in there Vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Product works great have not gotten any more dui since receiving it calibration was timely very useful things to keep in your car kids now have them in their rigs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awesome device to have around
customer_reviews.text: awesome device to have around. always interesting to see what you blow when you think you're still good to drive. so far its been a great product and has paid for itself 100 x over
customer_reviews.author: mschmidt

customer_reviews.title: best. thing. ever.
customer_reviews.text: I recommended this to all of my friends. Great tool for learning how you feel at different BACs. I've used this so many times I can now guess my BAC within .005 of the machine results. Also really fun at parties to see how drunk people are getting. Definitely worth the money to get the good one and a few extra tubes.
customer_reviews.author: Joester

customer_reviews.title: does not work need to return this item
customer_reviews.text: this product did not work need to return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Patkar

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE DO NOT BUY THIS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It says I'm blowing a 0.19 when I have not had 1 beer! I wish I would have read the reviews before buying this P.O.S!!! And when I go to return it the return policy is that YOU CANT RETURN THE BROKEN ITEM!!! do not waste your money now im out $99.97 for a big pile of junk
customer_reviews.author: Tilman

customer_reviews.title: Calibration schedule statements are vague/misleading.
customer_reviews.text: Online statements say calibration needed every 6-12 months. Which? That's a big range, at $25 per calibration. User Manual says If the product is used every day it "may" need to be recalibrated every month. At $25 ea, that would be $300 per year, on top of the $80 purchase price. What's the truth and reality of the recalibration needs? There are no clear statements about calibration requirements per number of uses. This looks more like a rental than a purchase. Is there another device that will work for a predictable number of uses?
customer_reviews.author: Roboberto

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Work--Keeps Reading FLOW No Matter How Many Times You Read The Instructions
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment! This breathalyzer simply does not work. It keeps reading FLOW no matter how you try to use it. Called customer support and there was no response. Went on the their website and there is no information on what could be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Good Value Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today. 1st time use and error "FLO"doesn't work out of the box. Tried 5 more times. Fail. SAVE YOUR MONEY!! Junk. Amazon was great in issuing a credit on an item that was "ineligible for return"
customer_reviews.author: J. P.

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: They helped me to understand how to use this breathalyzer and I am finding it very helpful. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and accurate every time and we have fun with it when we have friends and family over, especially when someone says "I'm not that drunk." They are always shocked at their reading when they feel straight!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Terry

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This item was defective out of the box. Amazon harass me about returning it. Finally they said they would give me a refund. They have a no return policy on this item. Do not buy this item. shop elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Def works. But u definitely can't use it back ...
customer_reviews.text: Def works. But u definitely can't use it back to back to back. I'd recomend waiting at least 5 minutes between use amongst people and 20 mins after your last drink to get the most accurate.
customer_reviews.author: j ken

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a solid product, does as advertised and nothing weird has happened with it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work good so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work good so far. Features are lacking, but all I really wanted was to know my BAC and it does that just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Stone

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Not sure how accurate it is
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Not sure how accurate it is. But it will definitely give you a good estimate of your BAC.
customer_reviews.author: cmdr keen

customer_reviews.title: Works great even after a year of use
customer_reviews.text: This device has sat in my center console of my car through 4 Midwest seasons, and it still works like new! It has been used to check my BAC before a drive home to make sure I’m at or below .07, and it may or may not have been used as a drinking game a few times as well!
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in 2017 and it met all my expectations. It has been use close to a thousand times and is still very accurate. Batteries last a very long time. It’s does it job of peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Melande Krupa

customer_reviews.title: Super accurate and exactly what i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say. Super accurate and exactly what i wanted. I will buy again for sure
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Easy & accurate
customer_reviews.text: Works easily & very accurate. Keeps me safe & out of trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just awesome
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome and appears to be extremely accurate way better to have one of these then get a DUI
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey D. Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Durable and well made.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Seems to be accurate, and it is durable. I haven't had an errors or battery issues. Have had it for almost a year.
customer_reviews.author: H. Clayson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: To my dismay, the unit does not work whatsoever. After consuming a fair amount of alcohol it erroneously read .000. The device has one job and doesn't seem to do it at all.
customer_reviews.author: Walker C. Richards

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to use with my teenage sons -- ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use with my teenage sons -- if you have teens, you'll understand! Anyway, I am a corporate nurse, so one of my duties is to test people with for alcohol if someone suspects they are drinking on the job. This machine is very similar to the one I use at work. I tested it on myself after one glass of wine and the result was what I would expect for someone my size.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from KC

customer_reviews.title: Super fun for parties and useful after a few drinks at the bar before driving.
customer_reviews.text: Super fun for parties and useful after a few drinks at the bar before driving.
customer_reviews.author: John Naha

customer_reviews.title: This is a dud and you can’t return it
customer_reviews.text: This product is a total dud that can’t even take a measurement.
customer_reviews.author: A Martin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I have tested it a few times and it has worked great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate. I use it on my teenage son and guests who drink while at our home
customer_reviews.author: Adoree F.

customer_reviews.title: Range isn’t what’s claimed.
customer_reviews.text: Decent, but the range is daw from what the claim. Anything over 0.13 will give an error. Also not available for return.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Lohman

customer_reviews.title: Best Of The Best
customer_reviews.text: bang for your buck!!its accurate and we use everytime family and friends come over and have some drinks so reliable...100%
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very useful, it's a little sensitive getting it to read the BAC, but I find it very beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So you know your limits
customer_reviews.text: Takes the subjective emotion out of knowing if you are impared. Very helpful to know your limits
customer_reviews.author: Danny 👦

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: nice product. seems to be very accurate. nice to have to peace of mind to know when i'm not legal to drive.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: This product didn’t work from the beginning.
customer_reviews.text: Product does not register any BAC since it showed up. Followed all the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: David S. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Measures higher alcohol levels with great accuracy. Great product, I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great party trick to show everyone
customer_reviews.text: Gives me a sense of relief to have this thing, great party trick to show everyone. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: Not cheap but works well. Newer model so the model number is not listed on the box for replacement mouthpieces, but they only appear to make one kind and it fits this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate so far. Peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Holly D Harrod

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Seems to be very accurate! Good fun at parties!
customer_reviews.author: Grizzly660

customer_reviews.title: Great for parties
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few times to figure out ...but works well once you figure it out! Great for parties!
customer_reviews.author: P.Dubb

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I have no way to judge accuracy other ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I have no way to judge accuracy other than drinking and blowing and comparing to what I should be and it seems to be in line. I think for best results, it helps to wait 10 minutes after last drink before your test.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Beacham

customer_reviews.title: ... to make sure you blow into it for a good 5 seconds or so until you hear the double ...
customer_reviews.text: works well but you have to make sure you blow into it for a good 5 seconds or so until you hear the double beep.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Heuer

customer_reviews.title: This device is compact and very easy to comprehend
customer_reviews.text: This device is compact and very easy to comprehend. I do not use it for any official purpose but I like to think that it has save myself and friend from driving under the influence.
customer_reviews.author: TIMOTHY CORMIER

customer_reviews.title: Great Accuracy, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great Accuracy, easy to use, doesnt seem to collect moisture inside it like other units ive used. The beep is a little loud.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Troast

customer_reviews.title: Consistent and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Consistent and accurate. It does everything I need and would expect. If I had to pick one thing to change, it would be to have an easier way to scroll through the past tests. Love the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great tool to have if you have had a dui or a intoxilyzer installed in your car it works and yes it is accurate
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works very well in my opinion. I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my opinion. I use it after a few drinks to make sure I'm under the limit for my mandatory car BAC lock and it is more sensitive than the monthly calibrated car unit, but still always within .005-.008 of what the car unit reads.
customer_reviews.author: Eric James

customer_reviews.title: Not calibrated!
customer_reviews.text: This is total piece of junk. And it is not returnable. The numbers are all over the place. 4 hours after 2 glasses of wine it reads 0.4. NOT 0.04, but 0.4. I should be in a coma, but I'm writing this review. An older analyzer is reading 0.01! Defective, and you won't get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Leclair

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It keeps giving ridiculously high readings like .35 when the subject only had two beers... Would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Zoltan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fabulous piece of equipment. Easy to use. Turn it on, wait til the countdown goes from 12 secs to 2 secs. Take a deep breath and blow at 0 seconds until you hear the beep. Within 10-15 seconds, you have your reading. Great for checking your family member who insists they were not drinking when they come home at 3am with blood shot eyes and reek of alcohol- No more lying. Or use it to check yourself to make sure you are under the limit to drive. Accurate from 0.0 to 0.40. Comes with 6 mouthpieces. Highly recommend this over any of the other brands.
customer_reviews.author: blondbikernurse

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product about once every week when I have company over and we are drinking. I am able to persuade them to stay the night if they blow too high of a number, which gives me peace of mind. The numbers are accurate, as I have had a friend who was sober blow a .00 immediately after a friend blew a .10 using the same mouthpiece. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME PRODUCT. As a person who had to get Interlock installed in their vehicle after making some bad decisions, I bought this breathalyzer to test my BAC before attempting to start my car. Not only does it have pinpoint accuracy, it starts right up, the battery's last forever, and it gives you a BAC to the 1,000th decimal. I absolutely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very consistent readings! Mine came with 20 extra mouthpieces ...
customer_reviews.text: Very consistent readings! Mine came with 20 extra mouthpieces as well. I'll probably never use them all, because people who have been drinking don't seem to care that much about germs. It definitively resolves the dispute over who's driving home.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without it.
customer_reviews.text: Quite an eye opener. We like to go out a have a drink or two. First time out went to a ball game and had some beers. I blew a .07 with this litte pocket protector and decided to wait an hour before driving. My next test was a .05. Truly worth the money for safety and peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Christian W. Sokoll

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use it as a substitute for responsible behavior with good judgement, but it's fun when looked at as ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to work. Wouldn't use it as a substitute for responsible behavior with good judgement, but it's fun when looked at as a novalty
customer_reviews.author: Nathan W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very accurate and easy to use. I have 4 units. This is my favorite and most accurate. Never had a DUI and in my profession can't get one.
customer_reviews.author: Arty

customer_reviews.title: Save lives! Know your BAC
customer_reviews.text: Reliable way to tell if you and your friends are above or below the limit. Much cheaper than a DUI or killing someone or yourself. Every person who drinks then drives should have one. Every bar should have one. Best gift I have ever given. No person has ever said they regretting using it. Gameify it. What's you BAC? The more accurate you are you get a free taxi. Figure it out people! Don't drive drunk. You can play pool with me when you're drunk, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A DUI on your record is like being a felon
customer_reviews.text: This will save you from the cops ruining people's lives because they have 3 beers in them while driving. You have no idea what they do to you when you get a DUI. A DUI on your record is like being a felon.
customer_reviews.author: Rem

customer_reviews.title: This breathalyzer is small enough to carry in your pocket ...
customer_reviews.text: This breathalyzer is small enough to carry in your pocket so you can check your own drinking to make sure your not over the limit to drive home safely or call a cab.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: but it is an excellent reality check of how drunk you are
customer_reviews.text: I'm trusting it as much as one can. I have no other reference and don't use it often, but it is an excellent reality check of how drunk you are. You *could* have fun gauging other people at a party, but seriously, I bring this with me if I've been out and need to drive back home and it's helped me be responsible.
customer_reviews.author: holyzoo

customer_reviews.title: It sometimes feels like the BAC provided is inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: It sometimes feels like the BAC provided is inaccurate, which concerns me for the price and quality I'm expecting. But it is fun to have with friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy with my purchase. This device is very accurate. You get what you pay for. If keeping yourself and your friends safe from drinking and driving is important to you, I would definitely recommend this product. It also comes with 6 mouthpieces and a carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Good to know when to stay off the road
customer_reviews.text: Good to know when to stay off the road. This device does it. A lot cheaper than not knowing and getting in trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonphili

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best investment I've made since I started drinking. I use it regularly when going out on weekends.
customer_reviews.author: Goatsucker

customer_reviews.title: Treat it like gold always in the case never left in car
customer_reviews.text: Don't know for sure how accurate it is. Nothing to compare it to. Treat it like gold always in the case never left in car. If it's accurate then it's worth it's wt. in gold. A must have in this day and age. Wish I would have bought one before life ruining DUI.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Johnson

customer_reviews.title: For Fun
customer_reviews.text: Thought it would be fun to figure out my alcohol limit so got this to help figure out how many drinks until i approach DUI range. It was eye opening to see how few drinks in an hour it takes to get to .08. I've used it about 20 times so far and it seems to be very accurate. And now i know i shouldn't have more than 3 beers in any hour...which will come in handy!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well and can be entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work well. You definitely have to wait the 20 minutes before you blow. Testing the device is fun and you can see some CRAZY readings right after someone has taken a shot. I'll say this, it's good to keep on you if you drink often and have an option not to drive. It's also very fun to have at your place when hosting a party so that people can decide to take a cab, or sometimes compete to see who can blow the most lol.
customer_reviews.author: Wade P

customer_reviews.title: Defective right out of box
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! Right out of the box kept reading "FLO" error, even after troubleshooting and MULTIPLE attempts to correct. And heads up....it is not returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: very useful personal tool to stay safe and legal.
customer_reviews.text: so far i have used this about 10-12 times to see if i am legal to drive home after a couple of beers.. i double check each time.. seems very accurate in its comparative readings. very simple to use . so far i can not see any negatives. great product and gives me peace of mind that im good to go. a little consumption advise, based on using this , 2 pints of beer bring me to the maximum legal limit . so use this tool to be safe and to never drive while legally impaired.
customer_reviews.author: t.c

product_meta.title: BACtrack Trace Breathalyzer | Professional-Grade Accuracy | DOT & NHTSA Compliant | Portable Breath Alcohol Tester for Personal & Professional Use
product_meta.description: Package Quantity:1Powered by BACtrack's state-of-the-art Xtend Platinum Fuel Cell Sensor technology, the BACtrack Trace Professional Breathalyzer delivers reliable and accurate BAC results, with police-grade accuracy. From being used as an alcohol detector for employees in businesses to acting as an alcohol tester for patients in clinics or treatment centers, the Trace is perfect for a variety of professional alcohol sensing, detecting and testing applications. And because of its small size and portable design, it's also works great as a personal BAC breathalyzer. Help friends and family make better decisions while drinking with the accurate and affordable BACtrack Trace alcohol breathalyzer. The warm up time is 10-20 seconds and the blowing time is 5 seconds. Note-test subjects should wait 20 minutes after eating, drinking, or smoking before blowing into the bactrack breathalyzer. Failure to wait 20 minutes can provide inaccurate test results and damage the sensor. Operating temperature is 0 to 40 degree celsius
feature_bullets: POLICE-GRADE ACCURACY - Powered by BACtrack's platinum-based Xtend Fuel Cell Sensor, the Trace utilizes the same police-grade technology trusted by hospitals, clinics, and even law enforcement. These professional organizations trust BACtrack breath alcohol testers because they know they are getting the most accurate and reliable BAC results possible, every time they test. The Trace can detect trace amounts of alcohol, reliably handles high BAC levels and is accurate to the third decimal place, Sensor Accuracy + or - 0.005 at 0.050 percentage BAC

DOT/NHTSA APPROVED - The BACtrack Trace was designed to meet the rigorous standards of expert alcohol screeners, from roadside law enforcement to hospital employees and treatment professionals. Designated by the U.S. Dept. of Transportation & National Highway Traffic Safety Administration as an approved breath alcohol screening device, the Trace is also listed with FDA as a medical device, making it the top choice of safety-conscious individuals seeking a portable breathalyzer for home use.

SMALL & PORTABLE SIZE - The Trace is BACtrack's smallest professional breathalyzer, making it easy to take with you anywhere you go. Measuring just 4.25 x 1.875 x 0.625 inches, it's smaller than an iPhone 5, and easily fits in a purse or pocket. Test yourself and friends, or a family member. From individuals, parents and college students to dinner party hosts or bar employees, the Trace really is perfect for anyone looking for a quick, easy and reliable way to test their BAC.
The warm up time is 10-20 seconds and the blowing time is 5 seconds

SIMPLE, ONE-BUTTON OPERATION - The BACtrack Trace is extremely easy to use. Simply insert the two included AAA batteries, power on your breathalyzer and begin testing. It's that easy. Your BAC results are displayed 10 seconds later on a bright, easy to read LCD screen. It's convenient and practical built-in flashback memory saves the last 10 BAC readings for later reference.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
